main event: An aircrew sighted two unidentified flare-type objects while flying, appearing off the right front side of the aircraft.
interesting points: The objects appeared at one minute intervals,The objects had a blue-green color changing to white,The first object burned out at 9000 ft and the second at 6000 ft,The objects had a flat trajectory and burned out with a bright explosion similar to fireworks,The speed was similar to a falling star.
